name: Harvey's Heated Pool
description: Harvey's Lake Tahoe (now Caesars Republic Lake Tahoe) features a heated outdoor pool and hot tub area with views of Lake Tahoe and the surrounding Sierra Nevada mountains. The pool area is being reimagined as part of the property's $200 million transformation, with the new High Dive Pool and Lounge slated for completion in summer 2026. The redesigned space will feature a heated pool, hot tubs, an indoor-outdoor bar and lounge, premium cabana rentals, and plush loungers with seasonal beverage service.
shortDescription: Year-round heated outdoor pool with mountain and lake views at Harvey's Tahoe.

faqs.question: Is the pool heated?
faqs.answer: Yes, the outdoor pool is heated, making it comfortable even on cooler mountain days.

faqs.question: Is the pool open year-round?
faqs.answer: The pool operates seasonally, primarily from late spring through early fall.

faqs.question: Is there poolside food and drink service?
faqs.answer: Yes, beverages and light snacks are available poolside during open hours.

meta.title: Harvey's Heated Pool – Lake Tahoe Poolside | Golf The High Sierra
meta.description: Relax at Harvey's heated pool in Lake Tahoe with mountain views and poolside service. Perfect post-golf recovery.

testimonials.quote: Harvey's Heated Pool was a fun surprise on our trip. Perfect for the non-golfers and honestly the golfers enjoyed it too. South Lake Tahoe has so much more than just great courses.
testimonials.author: Nick D.

testimonials.quote: Visited Harvey's Heated Pool during our golf trip and it was a great addition to the itinerary. Nice change of pace from the courses. GTHS really knows how to round out a trip with the right activities.
testimonials.author: Karen B.
